titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to add human papillomavirus vaccines to the list of taxable vaccines for purposes of the Vaccine Injury Compensation Trust Fund.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to add human papillomavirus vaccines to the list of taxable vaccines for purposes of the Vaccine Injury Compensation Trust Fund.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to include any human papillomavirus vaccine as a taxable vaccine for excise tax purposes.
